data.title: Fontana, CA - Official Website

data.text:
Imagination Studio

Come and explore your imagination with hands-on lessons on artists and art movements. Learn techniques and use materials including charcoal, oil pastel, and acrylic paint, or choose your own art technique to master! Book an appointment for a one-on-one or group experience.

Special Needs Art Program (S.N.A.P)

S.N.A.P. is a welcoming and friendly arts environment designed to inspire creativity and an arts passion for Special Needs community members. Book an appointment for a one-on-one or group experience.

For pricing and booking your appointment, please get in touch with the Art Depot Gallery at (909) 349-6975 or email arts@fontana.org.
